showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Dominic in the shower area was also a lifesaver‚Äîhe helped me find everything I needed, from the location of the showers to the towels, and made sure I was all set. He was friendly, professional, and genuinely cared about making sure I had a ‚Ä¶
Very clean, had plenty of parking by 430, only downside was I had been next in line for a shower, I check again and I was skipped, no usual text, no announcements either. Extremely frustrating.
In for a shower. Janitor was waiting at my door (automated showers) asking me to leave a tip. Yeah, here's a "tip", if you don't like the pay, work somewhere else. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ with forced removal via tow truck a few times.  Even this Flying J has ‚Äò2-hour parking only‚Äô signs all over the yard. That‚Äôs about a meal and the bathroom and laundry and a shower and then you‚Äôre running to the car to be out in 2 hours. ‚Ä¶
I came here to take a shower, but I didn‚Äôt have any points for free shower since I just got pilot rewards card yesterday but they still gave me a free shower!

‚Ä¶ TRIED TO DO ANYTHING THEY COULD TO MAKE US CALM DOWN (66) (60) THAT EVERYTHING WILL BE OK! SO WE DIDNT MIND PAYING TO TAKE A SHOWER AND EAT! CUSTOMER SERVICE AT ITS FINEST!!! 5 üåüTHANK YOU GUYS SO MUCH, MARY ANN AND MARK THE WHOLE CREW ‚Ä¶

The store was nice, showers clean. Mark and Adrienne we very h mogul and the manager needs a lesson on customers courtesy.He is an arrogant boy, that needs to understand without truck drivers he wouldn‚Äôt have a job. I was never so ‚Ä¶

What grown man knocks on the door while another grown man takes a shower, also literally all night someone‚Äôs knocked back and forth on car waking people up. Really strange behavior, honestly surprised‚Ä¶

They are undergoing construction but showers are good. Parking isn‚Äôt bad, does get super congested at night.
The shower attendant even moved me and my boyfriend to a bigger shower, very thoughtful and appreciated!

‚Ä¶ to pull out the Marinara to make sandwhich... Meanwhile no one has checked the reserved parking to see what's available so nothing is "available" and if you're trying to get a shower good luck 15 guest waiting and no one is cleaning them..

showerReviews.reviewText: I pay for the shower and the TV wasn't working. I waited one (1) hour for the shower, when I went back to ask how much longer do I have to wait, one of the workers said I missed the shower while they didn't call out my number #95. They ‚Ä¶

Long Waite for dirty  shower.. I like feel a bit like home.  In a clean place, but sure, this is not most of our home nasty showers. No ac in the bathrooms fan not working well look at the vent and the fanü§Æü§¢ I wonder how they clean there ‚Ä¶

It‚Äôs very unusual to find a Love‚Äôs shower to be unpleasant to use. If I wasn‚Äôt in a rush I would have ask for another shower. The one time I decided not to pack a rag, there‚Äôs no rag but two floor matsü§¶üèø‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. The mirror wasn‚Äôt clean, the ‚Ä¶

Didn't expect the showers too look like this from looking at the outside. This shower didn't belong in this loves. I chose this location because it is fairly newer than the other. The showers look they were here before the building, lol. Di ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Nasty bath cloth left in the shower. Mold in the corner of the shower. Dust everywhere. Dirty toilet. Corporate needs to see this.

‚Ä¶ Photo is of a Prime truck driver who I watched park in the fuel island and walked into the store with his shower gear and wife or girlfriend or mistress with her backpack and they haven't been back to the truck in over 20 minutes. ‚Ä¶
Clean store, and the employees are always nice. Shower are very clean, I like that they are big and spacious. They also have chairs in them for accessibility.

Showers are disgusting.  $16 for what? Nasty dirty floor and walls. Mold everywhere. A/C duckt vents Mega dusty. Scary to touch anything. Do not even mention walking in without slip on flip flops.  Fungus guaranteed.  Never again. Requested ‚Ä¶
Reading other reviews I was worried about the cleanliness of the showers when I went in on Feb 8. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . There was a couple That stopped with their RV Unhooked their bronco and took my bf to The part store, they offered to pay for a shower went in and paid for it said they was told we could go in later they would allow us to shower. After ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I will highly request all the costumers who use shower at PILOT ,TA OR LOVE Use your own towels ‚Ä¶

Very disgusting showers, I‚Äôve been too many truck stops in the country and this by far was the worst shower experience I‚Äôve had. It is actually a health hazard. I told the cashier and she kindly gave me money back. The cashiers were nice, ‚Ä¶

Dirty. Perfectly describes this place. I walked in to this shower room as it is in the pictures. I set my stuff down and immediately noticed there was urine already in the toilet. The sink is disgusting. This location does not deserve your ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The bathroom for truckers are so filthy.  There's mold every where & they did a horrible job at cleaning. I couldn't even take a shower I had wasted a shower. I literally had to go to the love's next door to take a shower

Shower #8.  11/30/2024 9:30pm
This needs an overhaul. You can do better!

Black mold on everything. Orange mold, white mold. Everything rusted and the shower is so hard to turn on because it takes a literal tool to turn it off. The towels were wet and the attendant was rude. But all of us have congestion and ‚Ä¶
Lazy people here, more then 1 hour waiting for a shower with 1 person ahead of me
Really 17$us for this shower ü§Æ no Light, garbage full, no lock. Not acceptable ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The bathrooms are so moldy the first time I complained 3months ago they said the showers were getting power washed and it wouldn‚Äôt happen again here we are again I am sneezing like crazy and stuffed up from Mold allergies . Bathroom‚Äôs ‚Ä¶
A full sink with hair after cleaning the shower

showerReviews.reviewText: There‚Äôs no sense in selling showers if they don‚Äôt let you park for like an hour to get fuel and shower . I parked my truck and after I was warming my meal a guy came to ask me to move my truck , I told him I was gonna eat , get a shower and ‚Ä¶

This place is a dump. $20 to park and $10 for a shower even if you purchased fuel. It's basicly a place for the locals to park their truck to go home. There are literally people living in an old bus in the back lot. The 2 guys running the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: If you don‚Äôt have pilots points rewards why this shop works like a pilot, I was trying to get a shower but paying when we bought a lot of diesel with them, they said its impossible get a shower, only if I pay, really? With more than 5 ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ my sandwich had no clue what he was doing, then the I'm guessing manager took over and they bickered like two high school girls. The bathrooms were nasty and I didn't risk the clap for a shower. My suggestion? Go to flying J off of 524.

Great group of people, I stop here at least twice a week. I‚Äôve never had a bad experience. Always welcoming day or night. There very little parking available for trucks. Restrooms and shower are small however well maintained.

It easy a nice place they have a subway inside that has good food. They have bathroom and showers. I didn't use those but they are there if needed. They have a good size convenience store as well and gas. It has room for big trucks and they ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ There's always an FHP officer up there if you need help, if you're planning on doing dirt of any kind stay away! Also, it's a truck stop so they have a shower and other amenities that you can use here! Correction Subway is no longer 24/7üíØ‚úåüèæ ‚Ä¶

Driving from NY to southern FL I really needed a shower. I never used a truck stop shower before. It was clean, big and so worth the 12.00 I paid. There is no time limit. They have towels for you to use. There is also soap to wash up with. ‚Ä¶

Wanted to stop for a few hours sleep and a shower in the morning.  Was run off by cop hovering on the lot. This place is small and inhospitable.  It may bear the company name, but it IS NOT a Pilot Travel Center!  Don't waste your time ‚Ä¶

Unprofessional/Rude Staff, Nasty Restrooms, Outdated, I've tried to get a shower here 4 times and each time it was either cold or room temp, when I go tell the manager they won't refund my shower credit. I will never come here again.

The bathrooms were clean, but for anyone trying to shower, the temperature was freezing to slightly less cold. Regardless the water was extremely cold and I had a stained towel. Extremely disappointed with this Pilot.
Super tiny spot. Not able to purchase a shower cuz I was parked on side. Cashier refuse to give me a shower . Poor customer service
